PROMPTS_PAGE.TITLE: Prompts
PROMPTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Configure prompts for your account. These prompts can be used in the composer to quickly write a message.

FILE.LABEL: File
FILE.SUPPORTED_TYPES: Text-based file types up to 2MB supported.

IMAGE.LABEL: Image
IMAGE.SUPPORTED_TYPES: Image file types up to 2MB supported.
